text: 2065 (MMLXV) will be . ==Predicted and scheduled events== * January 1 â€“ Books, movies, and other works published in 1969 will enter the public domain in the United States. * March 2 - 100th anniversary of The Sound of Music. * May 18 - 100th anniversary of the Dolby. * June 1 - 100th anniversary of the MTA. * November 22: Venus occults Jupiter, the first occultation involving two planets since January 3, 1818. The next one will happen less than two years later, on July 15, 2067 (when Mercury occults Neptune). Category:2065
